Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne Abasuubili baboolanga mbu : “shichila shina nileshibwa isura,” ne niyishibwa isura yelilako mana barumbulamwo okhupana, olalola balia bemioyo chiabu chilimwo obulwale, bakhuhenganga shinga ulia womwoyo kukwe kurula nafwitsanga, halali nobulayi khubo
Okhuwulila nende amakhuwa amalayi. Ne likhuwa nilimalile okhusuubilwa, ne nibaba abatoto khu Nyasaye bulaba ubulayi khubo
Ne kasuubililungwa khwinywe mbu nimunyoola obunyali ni okhukhola amabii khushialo nende okhwira olwikho
Abo nibo ba Nyasaye yatsuba, mana nabekasia amarwi, ne niyoofusia tsimoni tsiabu
Ne shibaparangakhwo Ikurani ino tawe, nohomba emioyo chiabu chilikhwo amakafuli kachio
Toto balia bakalukha inyuma nibakhamala okhumanya obulunjifu, shetani yabakosia nabakatia
Ako nikhulwokhuba mbu baboola balia balenyanga okhuwulila aka Nyasaye yeshia mbu: “khwitsa okhubawulila mumakhuwa kandi,” Ne Nyasaye amanyile akefisile mumioyo chiabu
Ne kaliba karie olwa Abamalaika balibafwisia, nibaboopa obweni bwabu nende emikongo chiabu
Ako nilwokhuba mbu balooonda kasinyisia Nyasaye ne nibakhaya kamusangasia, mana nakwisa ibikhole biabu
Nohomba baparanga balia abali no bulwale mumioyo chiabu mbu Nyasaye shalira habulafu obusuku bwabu tawe
